title: Protect Your Heart From Offense | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Protect Your Heart From Offense | Victoria Osteen
description:
Offenses may come, but we have to decide whether or not to hold onto them. When you let go of the offense and put it into the hands of God, you're making way for the new things He wants to do in your life.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
